nodes.text: Tach Drud was a spice dealer who worked on the planet Coruscant. By the C.R.C. year 7942, Drud came to operate a spice den out of a curio shop on Level 3321.
Tach Drud was first mentioned in the canon reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and published in 2018.
